backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control plus read-only phone and crypto report getters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping requested PWA test modifications to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing multiple frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including manifest, icons, meta tags, and root app mount.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Docs confirming Phase 3a adds a read‑only canister and requires no frontend changes.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes back to the app shell.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Minimal PWA manifest for WebAPK testing with required fields and 192/512 icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Test service worker implementing install/activate caching and network-first fetch fallback.
frontend/PWA_WEBAPK_ANDROID_TEST.md: Checklist for testing WebAPK installation behavior in Chrome on Android.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up app providers, routing, consent gate, and PWA initialization, rendering pages based on normalized routes.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Defines a simple canister interface with an analyzeText function.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main layout with header navigation, mobile menu, language selector, and auth controls.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and displays profile menu when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative lookup results with risk score, categories, and error/empty states.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Shows a mandatory consent modal requiring acceptance of cookies and terms before using the app.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Triggers PWA installation and alerts if installation is not available.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown for selecting the app language from predefined options.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Small button component that triggers PWA installation using localized text.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Form dialog for submitting reports with validation, rate limiting, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Component rendering structured fraud analysis results with risk badges, icons, explanation, and recommendation using i18n.
User profile menu showing principal, history list, and logout, with identity and profile hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Hook initializing main, extra, and reports anti-fraud actors and logging readiness once per load.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Hook managing localStorage‑based consent state with versioning and accept action.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth client, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hook managing per‑identity user history stored in localStorage with add and clear operations.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: i18n context provider storing selected language in sessionStorage and exposing translations.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Portuguese translation dictionary containing UI labels, navigation, consent text, and app messages.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates HttpAgent instances and provides factory functions for main, extra, and reports canister actors.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Defines static canister IDs and a helper to fetch them by type.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Candid IDL and TypeScript interface for extra canister phone and crypto report lookup queries.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Candid IDL and interface for the main canister’s text analysis update method.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Candid IDL and interfaces for submitting reports and querying risk data across multiple report types.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates and logs a readiness report showing available canisters and supported methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup with light/dark theme variables and accessibility-focused global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: Documentation UI page with SEO setup and a button to generate a documentation PDF.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page providing message, email, phone, and crypto fraud analysis via tabbed inputs and result display.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Renders a multilingual 'How It Works' page with accordion-based sections and SEO metadata setup.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalMissionP: Empty file placeholder for an institutional mission page.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a general institutional page.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Displays the mission, vision, values, and limitations content using translation data and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy page with multiple sections sourced from translations and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Shows the terms and conditions page with structured sections populated from translations and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pwa/install.ts: Implements PWA installation handling by capturing install prompts and exposing a trigger function.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Provides a minimal custom router using browser history, custom events, and shared state.
Builds a full documentation structure combining static text with translation-driven institutional content.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Applies heuristic checks to classify emails as safe or flagged based on domains, TLDs, patterns, and character usage.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Builds technical documentation text content and triggers a downloadable TXT file using data from documentationContent.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements a local cooldown timer using localStorage to limit report submissions.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Scores messages for scam risk using keyword weights, crypto patterns, URLs, punctuation, and caps usage.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets page title and meta description dynamically with AntiFraud branding.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Generates structured fraud‑risk evaluations using localized templates and heuristic indicators.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Performs dictionary‑based term replacement to translate backend analysis text into multiple languages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across navigation.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages user profiles in localStorage, storing history and preferences keyed by principal.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing scope, architecture notes, issues, and features for rebuilding a multilingual PWA/mobile antifraud app.
